name: The XV Project
description:
The simulation is unstable, running out of memory.
Use the XV Device to solve its puzzles and help restore it.

Simple first person puzzle game.
Enjoy!

Made by one person, in a week, for the 2021 Epic Mega Jam
@theAllshar

Gameplay instructions
  • Mouse to look
  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • Aim, hold and release LMB to place source markers.
  • Aim, hold and release RMB to place target marker. 
  • Q to clear markers. 
Explanation

Place two markers with left mouse button. This volume will be cut and pasted to the location of the target marker (right mouse button).
Volume has size limitations.
